title: Did not receive an All Star 2016 icon
body:
I voted for the teams, and it says that the icon will appear in my inventory 1-3 days. Those days have passed, and I still haven't received the icon yet.

**Ignore this post, I realized it will be 1-3 after November 8th. Smh.

replies.body: Yup, the icons usually take around 3 days to roll out after the [provided ](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/all-star/results/na-lcs/)date.  Hang tight!
